FORM.DELETE_CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE: Do you really want to remove?
FORM.NO_TEMPLATES: You do not need to update templates, because you do not have them.
FORM.NO_INVOKERS: You do not need to update invokers, because you do not have them.
FORM.NO_CONNECTIONS: You do not need to update connections, because you do not have them.

FINISH.NEW_VERSION: After you click start update the system will try to update the opencelium files and also the databases. On the next the system will restart. Wait about 2 minutes and then try opencelium again.
FINISH.LOG_MESSAGE: You can restore (see <0>{{restoreLinkText}}</0>) the old system in any time if an error occurs.
FINISH.BACKUP_MESSAGE: Please, do not forget to create a backup of the system, before you start the update (see <0>{{backupLinkText}}</0>).
FINISH.CLEAR_CACHE: Don't forget to clear browser cache (especially the javascript cache).

VALIDATION_MESSAGES.NO_UPDATE_MODE: Please, select how do you want to update
VALIDATION_MESSAGES.NEO4j_DOWN: Neo4j is down. Please, turn it on.
